DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Study IZN-6D4 Gel Treatment Diabetic Foot Ulcers
DOC.detailed_description: This multi center , double-blind , randomize , placebo-controlled trial . A total 80 patient randomize accord 1 : 1 randomization schedule . To participate trial , patient must current Diabetic Foot Ulcer ( DFU ) 60 day 2 year screen visit . In 2-week period screen baseline visit , patient 's DFU must heal 30 % , wound area , treat SWT twice week screening period . During treatment period 4 week patient examine weekly basis site staff . Treatment SWT plus study gel ( IZN-6D4 Gel placebo gel ) ( include necessary debridement ) administer weekly visit . In addition , patient caregiver train perform SWT plus study treatment home midweek visit .
